author: tomekopo
msg: - Fixed layout issue with hidden viewer on Chrome and Safari;

author: ningjiang
msg: CAMEL-3683 Updated the content message header of multi-part request in camel-cxf component

author: pamarcelot
msg: Last final fix for DIRSHARED-91 (Solve the issue with an embedded Felix running in codec while being embedded in eclipse RCP).
The Activator was not called automatically.
Setting the 'Bundle-ActivationPolicy' directive to 'lazy' will help the Activator to be called whenever a first class in the bundle is accessed.
